text: Do you feel energized after spending time with others?
Are you comfortable with public speaking?
Do you prefer one-on-one conversations over group discussions?
How often do you seek out social events and gatherings?
When making decisions, do you rely more on your gut feeling or logic?
How do you feel about spending time alone?
When meeting new people, are you typically the first to strike up a conversation?
Do you find it easy to express your thoughts and emotions to others?
In your free time, do you often seek out new experiences and adventures?
How do you recharge after a long day?
options: Spend time with friends or in social settings
Spend time alone in a quiet space
